mapper.sql: id, transfer_invest_id, login_name, loan_id, amount, status, transfer_status, source, is_auto_invest, channel, is_no_password_invest, created_time, updated_time, invest_time, trading_time, achievements, invest_fee_rate, contract_no, is_overdue_transfer
mapper.update: update invest set login_name = #{loginName}, loan_id = #{loanId}, amount = #{amount}, status = #{status}, source = #{source}, is_auto_invest = #{isAutoInvest}, channel = #{channel}, is_no_password_invest = #{isNoPasswordInvest}, created_time = #{createdTime}, updated_time = now(), trading_time = #{tradingTime}, achievements = #{achievements, typeHandler=com.tuotiansudai.repository.mybatis.InvestAchievementListTypeHandler}, invest_fee_rate = #{investFeeRate} where id = #{id}
update invest set transfer_status = #{transferStatus}, updated_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from invest where id = #{id} for update

select invest.id, invest.transfer_invest_id, invest.login_name, invest.loan_id, invest.amount, invest.status, invest.transfer_status, invest.source, invest.is_auto_invest, invest.created_time, invest.invest_time, invest.trading_time, invest.achievements, invest.contract_no from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and loan.status <> 'CANCEL' order by case when invest.trading_time is null then invest.created_time else invest.trading_time end desc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}
select * from invest where transfer_invest_id in (select id from invest where login_name = #{transfer})
select count(1) from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and loan.status <> 'CANCEL'

select invest.id, invest.transfer_invest_id, invest.login_name, invest.loan_id, invest.amount, invest.status, invest.transfer_status, invest.source, invest.is_auto_invest, invest.created_time, invest.invest_time from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and loan.status <> 'CANCEL' and invest.transfer_invest_id is null order by invest.created_time desc
limit #{index}, #{pageSize}
select count(1) from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and invest.transfer_invest_id is null and loan.status <> 'CANCEL'

select
from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS' and transfer_status != 'SUCCESS' order by trading_time
select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS' and transfer_invest_id is null

select
from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and transfer_invest_id is null and status = '${status}' order by case when trading_time is null then created_time else trading_time end desc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}
select count(1) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and transfer_invest_id is null and status = '${status}'

select IFNULL(sum(amount), 0) as amount from invest where status = 'SUCCESS' and not exists (select 1 from user_role where user_role.login_name=invest.login_name and user_role.role= 'LOANER') and trading_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select count(*) from invest join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id and loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'

select count(*) from invest join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id and loan.activity_type = 'NEWBIE' and loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'
select count(*) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS'
select distinct channel from invest where channel is not NULL
select IFNULL(channel,'其他') from invest group by channel order by channel desc
select login_name from invest where invest.status = 'SUCCESS'
select count(distinct(login_name)) from invest where invest.status = 'SUCCESS' and transfer_invest_id is null
select count(*) from account a where not exists(select 1 from invest i where a.login_name = i.login_name and i.status='SUCCESS');
SELECT t.`login_name` FROM invest t WHERE t.`status` = 'SUCCESS' GROUP BY t.`login_name` HAVING MAX(t.`trading_time`) < DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)

select case when loan.periods ='1' then 30 when loan.periods ='3' then 90 when loan.periods ='6' then 180 ELSE 360 END as productName, IFNULL(sum(invest.amount), 0) as totalInvestAmount, COUNT(invest.id) as countInvest, ROUND(IFNULL(sum(invest.amount), 0)/ COUNT(invest.id)) as avgInvestAmount from invest join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.status='SUCCESS' and invest.trading_time between '2015-07-01 00:00:00' and date_add(curdate(), interval '00:00:00' hour_second) group by loan.periods ORDER BY productName
select min(trading_time) from invest where status = 'SUCCESS' and loan_id = #{loanId}
select * from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and login_name = #{loginName} and status = 'SUCCESS'

SELECT invest.login_name, SUM(invest.amount) sumAmount, user.user_name, user.mobile FROM invest INNER JOIN user ON invest.login_name = user.login_name WHERE invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(invest.trading_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{tradingTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND invest.trading_time BETWEEN #{activityBeginTime} AND #{activityEndTime} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM transfer_application ta WHERE ta.login_name = invest.login_name AND ta.application_time between #{activityBeginTime} and #{tradingTime} ) GROUP BY login_name , user.user_name , user.mobile ORDER BY sumAmount DESC , MAX(invest.trading_time)

SELECT rr.`referrer_login_name` AS login_name, SUM(t.`amount`) AS sumAmount, u.`user_name`, u.`mobile` FROM referrer_relation rr JOIN invest t ON rr.`login_name` = t.`login_name` AND t.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND DATE_FORMAT(t.`trading_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{tradingTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND t.`trading_time` BETWEEN #{activityBeginTime} AND #{activityEndTime} JOIN user u ON rr.`referrer_login_name` = u.`login_name` WHERE rr.`level` = 1 GROUP BY rr.`referrer_login_name`, u.`user_name`, u.`mobile` ORDER BY SUM(t.`amount`) DESC, MAX(t.`trading_time`) LIMIT #{index}, #{pageSize}

select * from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS' and achievements is not null and achievements != '' order by LOCATE('MAX_AMOUNT', achievements) desc, LOCATE('FIRST_INVEST', achievements) desc

SELECT invest.loan_id, invest.id as invest_id, invest.amount , invest.created_time, invest.transfer_status, invest.is_overdue_transfer, loan.name as loan_name, loan.base_rate, loan.activity_rate, ( select min(ir.repay_date) from invest_repay ir where ir.invest_id = invest.id and ir.status in ('REPAYING') ) as next_repay_date,
(select ir.expected_interest + ir.corpus - ir.expected_fee from invest_repay ir where ir.invest_id = invest.id and ir.status in ('REPAYING') and ir.period = (select min(ir.period) from invest_repay ir where ir.invest_id = invest.id and ir.status in ('REPAYING')) ) as next_repay_amount FROM invest INNER JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id INNER JOIN loan_details ld on invest.loan_id = ld.loan_id WHERE invest.login_name = #{loginName} AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM `transfer_application` ta1 where ta1.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.id) or DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT((select max(ta2.application_time) from `transfer_application` ta2 where ta2.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.`id` and ta2.status = 'CANCEL'),'%Y-%m-%d')) <> 0) AND ((invest.is_overdue_transfer = 1 and EXISTS(select 1 from invest_repay where invest_repay.invest_id = invest.id and invest_repay.period=loan.periods and invest_repay.status='OVERDUE')) OR (loan.status = 'REPAYING' AND invest.transfer_status = 'TRANSFERABLE' AND DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT((SELECT min(lr.repay_date) FROM `loan_repay` lr where lr.`loan_id` = loan.`id` AND DATE(NOW()) >= DATE(loan.`recheck_time`) AND DATE(lr.`repay_date`) >=DATE(NOW()) and lr.status = 'REPAYING'), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) > (SELECT days_limit FROM transfer_rule))) ORDER BY invest.created_time DESC limit #{index}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM invest INNER JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id INNER JOIN loan_details ld on invest.loan_id = ld.loan_id WHERE invest.login_name = #{loginName} AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM `transfer_application` ta1 where ta1.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.id) or DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT((select max(ta2.application_time) from `transfer_application` ta2 where ta2.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.`id` and ta2.status = 'CANCEL'),'%Y-%m-%d')) <> 0) AND ((invest.is_overdue_transfer = 1 and EXISTS(select 1 from invest_repay where invest_repay.invest_id = invest.id and invest_repay.period=loan.periods and invest_repay.status='OVERDUE')) OR (loan.status = 'REPAYING' AND invest.transfer_status = 'TRANSFERABLE' AND DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT((SELECT min(lr.repay_date) FROM `loan_repay` lr where lr.`loan_id` = loan.`id` AND DATE(NOW()) >= DATE(loan.`recheck_time`) AND DATE(lr.`repay_date`) >=DATE(NOW()) and lr.status = 'REPAYING'), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) > (SELECT days_limit FROM transfer_rule)))

SELECT invest.id, invest.transfer_invest_id, invest.login_name, invest.loan_id, invest.amount, invest.status, invest.transfer_status, invest.is_overdue_transfer, invest.source, invest.is_auto_invest, invest.created_time, invest.invest_time FROM invest INNER JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id INNER JOIN loan_details ld on invest.loan_id = ld.loan_id WHERE invest.login_name = #{loginName} AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM `transfer_application` ta1 where ta1.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.id) or DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT((select max(ta2.application_time) from `transfer_application` ta2 where ta2.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.`id` and ta2.status = 'CANCEL'),'%Y-%m-%d')) <> 0) AND ((invest.is_overdue_transfer = 1 and EXISTS(select 1 from invest_repay where invest_repay.invest_id = invest.id and invest_repay.period=loan.periods and invest_repay.status='OVERDUE')) OR (loan.status = 'REPAYING' AND invest.transfer_status = 'TRANSFERABLE' AND DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT((SELECT min(lr.repay_date) FROM `loan_repay` lr where lr.`loan_id` = loan.`id` AND DATE(NOW()) >= DATE(loan.`recheck_time`) AND DATE(lr.`repay_date`) >=DATE(NOW()) and lr.status = 'REPAYING'), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) > (SELECT days_limit FROM transfer_rule))) ORDER BY invest.created_time DESC limit #{index}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM invest INNER JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id INNER JOIN loan_details ld on invest.loan_id = ld.loan_id WHERE invest.login_name = #{loginName} AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM `transfer_application` ta1 where ta1.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.id) or DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT((select max(ta2.application_time) from `transfer_application` ta2 where ta2.`transfer_invest_id` = invest.`id` and ta2.status = 'CANCEL'),'%Y-%m-%d')) <> 0) AND ((invest.is_overdue_transfer = 1 and EXISTS(select 1 from invest_repay where invest_repay.invest_id = invest.id and invest_repay.period=loan.periods and invest_repay.status='OVERDUE')) OR (loan.status = 'REPAYING' AND invest.transfer_status = 'TRANSFERABLE' AND DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT((SELECT min(lr.repay_date) FROM `loan_repay` lr where lr.`loan_id` = loan.`id` AND DATE(NOW()) >= DATE(loan.`recheck_time`) AND DATE(lr.`repay_date`) >=DATE(NOW()) and lr.status = 'REPAYING'), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) > (SELECT days_limit FROM transfer_rule)))
select count(1) from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and loan.status <> 'CANCEL' and loan.product_type = 'EXPERIENCE'
mapper.update: update invest set contract_no = #{contractNo} where id = #{investId}
update invest set contract_no = #{contractNo} where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS' and transfer_invest_id is null
mapper.select:
select
from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and transfer_invest_id is null and status = 'SUCCESS' and (contract_no is null or contract_no = '') order by invest_time asc

select user.city as city, sum(invest.amount) as sumAmount from invest inner join user on invest.login_name = user.login_name where invest.status = 'SUCCESS' and EXISTS (select 1 from loan l where l.id = invest.loan_id and l.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE')
and DATE_FORMAT(invest.invest_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by city order by sumAmount desc limit 0, 3

select sum(amount) as sumAmount from invest inner join user on invest.login_name = user.login_name where invest.status = 'SUCCESS' and EXISTS (select 1 from loan l where l.id = invest.loan_id and l.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE')
and DATE_FORMAT(invest.invest_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select invest.* from invest join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'
and (loan.product_type = 'EXPERIENCE' and exists(select * from invest_repay ir where ir.status='COMPLETE' and ir.invest_id = invest.id and ir.period = 1) or (loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' and loan.status = 'COMPLETE' and invest.transfer_status != 'SUCCESS') or (loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' and invest.transfer_status = 'SUCCESS'))
and (loan.product_type = 'EXPERIENCE' and exists(select * from invest_repay ir where ir.status='REPAYING' and ir.invest_id = invest.id and ir.period = 1) or (loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' and loan.status in ('REPAYING','OVERDUE') and invest.transfer_status != 'SUCCESS'))
and loan.status in ('RAISING','RECHECK') and loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE'
order by case when invest.trading_time is null then invest.created_time else invest.trading_time end desc, invest.id asc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}

select count(1) from invest join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'
and ((loan.product_type = 'EXPERIENCE' and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(invest_time) >= loan.duration) or (loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' and loan.status = 'COMPLETE' and invest.transfer_status != 'SUCCESS') or (loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' and invest.transfer_status = 'SUCCESS'))
and ((loan.product_type = 'EXPERIENCE' and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(invest_time) < loan.duration) or (loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE' and loan.status in ('REPAYING','OVERDUE') and invest.transfer_status != 'SUCCESS'))
and loan.status in ('RAISING','RECHECK') and loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE'
select count(1) from invest where login_name = #{loginName} and status = 'SUCCESS' and loan_id > 1 and trading_time <= #{datePoint}

SELECT invest.* FROM invest JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id WHERE invest.login_name = #{loginName} AND invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND invest.trading_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY trading_time ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT invest.* FROM invest JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id WHERE invest.login_name = #{loginName} AND invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND loan.activity_type!='NEWBIE' AND invest.trading_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY trading_time ASC

SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount),0) AS sumAmount FROM invest JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id JOIN loan_details ON invest.loan_id = loan_details.loan_id WHERE invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND invest.login_name = #{loginName} AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL AND loan.activity_type!='NEWBIE' AND loan.product_type != '_30' AND loan.id!='1' AND (loan_details.activity_desc IS NULL OR loan_details.activity_desc !='0元购') AND invest.trading_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT distinct user.mobile from invest join user on invest.login_name = user.login_name join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where loan.id = #{loanId} AND invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND invest.transfer_invest_id IS NULL

SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount),0) FROM invest JOIN loan ON invest.loan_id = loan.id WHERE invest.status = 'SUCCESS' AND loan.id!='1' AND( loan.status='RAISING' OR loan.status='RECHECK' OR loan.status='REPAYING' OR loan.status='OVERDUE') AND transfer_status !='SUCCESS' AND login_name=#{loginName}
mapper.update: update invest set is_overdue_transfer = 1 where id = #{investId}
